snippet: One of the bloodiest days of fighting since forces loyal to the Tripoli-based Government of National Accord began an offensive in May to retake the city.
lead_paragraph: One of the bloodiest days of fighting since forces loyal to the Tripoli-based Government of National Accord began an offensive in May to retake the city.

headline.main: Many Pro-Government Troops in Libya Killed in Fight With ISIS for Surt
